translation: From the Kanesh colony to Aqil-..., our messenger, every single and the trading stations: A tablet has come to the City.
When the tablet was discussed in the City. This day no one may bring the tin on the City. The Kanesh colony will take a tablet from the City.

Since you hear our letter you have heard our letter, whether he has already sold it to a palace or he has now set down as owed by me, or he has not yet sold it. Whatever silver was sworn by the City and what was sworn by the City and what was sworn by our messenger so I can set out and come here with our messenger so I can do you with our messenger.
The death of our tablets I sent to every single colony and the trading stations. Let us not obstruct me.
